pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multi-Parameter Regression (MPR) // Fitting Multi-Parameter Regression (MPR) models to right-censored survival data. These are flexible parametric regression models which extend standard models, for example, proportional hazards. See Burke MacKenzie (2016) doi:10.1111/biom.12625 and Burke et al (2020) doi:10.1111/rssc.12398.
